content: Kwik Bolt 3 Countersunk Wedge anchor SS304 High-performance wedge anchor with everyday approvals for uncracked concrete (304 stainless steel, countersunk) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Countersunk head – ideal for flush mounted applications Rounded end for easier installation Also available in carbon steel Applications Fastening structural steel Attaching exterior hand rails and signs Fastening exterior seating and bleachers Glazing Fastening curtain wall and masonry façades ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless Steel, 304 Head configuration: Countersunk Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless Steel, 304 | Head configuration | Countersunk | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked) | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening, Through-fastening | Installation tools | TE 6-22 Cordless rotary hammer | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor with temporary condensation, Outdoor (more than 1km to coast) ### ITEMS- 286044 - Exp anchor KB3 C 1/4 x 3 SS304 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x KB3 SS304 C 1/4X3 Stud anchor - 0.01x Nut - 3001245 - Exp anchor KB3 C 1/4 x 3 SS304 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 500x KB3 SS304 C 1/4X3 Stud anchor - 5x Nut - 286045 - Exp anchor KB3 C 3/8 x 4 SS304 - Package Size 50 pc Package Contents: - 1x KB3 SS304 C 3/8X4 Stud anchor - 0.02x Nut - 3001246 - Exp anchor KB3 C 3/8 x 4 SS304 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 250x KB3 SS304 C 3/8X4 Stud anchor - 5x Nut
